text: NguMvelinqangi owehlisela phansi inkulumo enhle kakhulu incwadi ziyefana ziphindaphindiwe, izikhumba zalabo abesaba iNkosi yabo ziyathuthumela bngayo bese izikhumba zabo kanye nezinhliziyo zabo ziyathamba enkumbulweni kaMvelinqangi, lokho ngukuhola kukaMvelinqangi, uhola ngako lowo amthandayo, futhi lowo uMvelinqangi amdukisayo ngakho-ke angeke abenaye umholi
